modal.title: How can we help you?
modal.text_intro: It seems this is your first day using {appName}. If you wish we can give you a short {introductionLink}. For an in-depth documentation please visit {docLink}.

intro.profile_combo_button1: The profile chooser menu indicates the currently active profile. The dropdown menu can be used to create or choose other profiles and organizations.
intro.profile_combo_button2: The dropdown menu can be used to create or choose other profiles and organizations.
intro.profile_combo_button3: You can create multiple private, group or organization profiles depending on your permissions
intro.profile_sidebar1: The profile sidebar is used to navigate to various features and settings of the currently active profile.
intro.profile_sidebar2: The available features may differ depending on profile settings and user permissions.
intro.profile_breadcrumb: Here you can see which feature is currently active.
intro.account_menu: The account menu provides access for account specific features as account and security settings as well as your personal notifications.

aria.root: This is a modal window. To close this window use the cancel button or press escape or submit the modal by using the submit button.
This is a confirm modal. You can either confirm or cancel your last action.

default.title: Confirm action
default.text: Are you sure you want to perform this action?

filter.empty: No entries found for given filter.

common.empty_result_filter: No entries found for the given filter.
common.show_password: Show password as plain text. Warning: this will display your password on the screen.

status.403: You are not allowed to view this page!

confirm.text: Are you sure you want to archive this tag?
Are you sure you want to add this tag from archive?

help.includeOnFilter: This option will hide tagged items in some views unless a matching filter is selected.

validation.maxLength: {property} must be at least {c1} characters of fewer
validation.matches: {property} does not match the expected format

error.title: Error

unknown.title: Error
unknown.message: An unexpected error occurred, please try again later.

error.500: A problem occurred while handling your request, please try again later.
error.403: Your access to the requested service was denied.
error.404: The requested service could not be found.
error.429: Too many requests. Please wait for a few seconds before submitting another request.

network.title: Network Error
network.message: There seems to be an issue with your network connection, please make sure you are connected to the internet.

csrf.title: Invalid application state
csrf.message: Please reload this site, otherwise some parts of the application may not work as expected.

confirm.archive: Are you sure you want to archive this content
confirm.unarchive: Are you sure you want to restore this content from the archive

updater.message: New content available, click on reload button to update.
